NITS '23 Yearbook

A great way to remember all the good and bad times shared together in Silchar

The Yearbook we wish to create

We hope to create an yearbook that contains:

  1. Memorable pictures of college fests and festivals
  2. An individual quote and picture from every student
  3. Pictures of the general fresher's, branch fresher's, and farewell parties
  4. Pictures of club and society events
  5. Remembrances and more fragments of nostalgia in the memory lane section
  6. And a Slam Page where you can get your friends to sign
In order for us to make the best yearbook possible, we need your help. Send us any pictures of you and your friends taken during your college life and upload it below!

Upload any photos

Upload your quote and photo

And if you are a student of the NITS '23 batch, send us a quote (anything funny, personal, from your favourite show or movie, or from a respected person) that symbolises your college life along with a picture of you.

Upload your Quote and photo!
